Translations.Text: Lalle ne, Mu, Muka saukar da shi a cikin wani dare mai albarka. Lalle Mu' Mun kasance Masu yin gargaɗi
A cikinsa (shi daren) ake rarrabe kowane umurui bayyananne
Umurni na daga wurin Mu. Lalle Mu ne Muka kasance Masu aikawa
Saboda rahama daga Ubangijinka. Lalle Shi, Shi ne Mai ji, Masani
(Shi ne) Ubangijin sammai da ƙasa da abin da ke a tsakaninsu, idan kun kasance masu yaƙini (za ku gane haka)
Babu abin bautawa face Shi. Yana rayarwa Kuma Yana kashewa. (Shi ne) Ubangijinku, kuma Ubangijin ubanninku na farko
A'a su, suna wasa a cikin shakka
Saboda haka, ka dakata ranar da sama za ta zo da hayaƙi bayyananne
Yana rufe mutane. Wannan wata azaba ce mai raɗaɗi
Ya Ubangijinmu! Ka kuranye mana azaba. Lalle Mu, masu imani ne
Ina tunawa take a gare su, alhali kuwa, haƙiƙa, Manzo mai bayyanawa Ya je musu (da gargaɗin saukar azabar, ba su karɓa ba)
Sa'an nan suka juya baya daga gare shi, Kuma suka ce: "Wanda ake gayawa* ne, mahaukaci
Lalle Mu, Masu kuranyewar azaba ne, a ɗan lokaci kaɗan, lalle ku, masu komawa ne (ga laifin)
Ranar da Muke damƙa, damƙa mafi girma, lalle ne Mu masu azabar ramuwa ne
Kuma lalle ne haƙiƙa a gabaninsu, Mun fitini mutanen Fir'auna, kuma wani Manzo karimi ya je musu
